Title: World Poverty Eradication Day: Kogi stakeholders call for political will to fight poverty
Summary: The federal, state, and local governments have been called upon to demonstrate positive political will, determination, and resilience to reduce the scourge of poverty in the country . The Kogi State social security stakeholders made the call during World Poverty Eradication Day .

Title: Experts warn as 16,000 Nigerians die by suicide annually
Summary: Experts warn as 16,000 Nigerians die by suicide annually . Young people among the most affected . They made this known on Friday at the third Vanguard Mental Health conference .

Title: Residents protest planned demolition of Lagos market
Summary: One of the traders, Mrs Temitope Olufowokan, urged the LCDA chairman to suspend the planned demolition . The traders are urging the decision to take place during the festive period .

Title: Trump critic John Bolton pleads not guilty to mishandling classified info
Summary: Bolton rejected the charges and said he had "become the latest target in weaponizing the Justice Department" In a statement, Bolton said he was "the latest target" to be weaponized by Justice Department .

Title: ASUU Strike: Senate wades in, meets Education Minister Tuesday
Summary: The planned meeting with the Federal Government and NUC will come after today's meeting with ASUU leadership at the National Assembly . Senate wades in, meets Education Minister Tuesday .
